block

Class block

  • java.lang.Object
    • block.block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    dot, e1, e2, e3, e4, justblockall, nothing, ocorner1, ocorner2, ocorner3, ocorner4, ohor, overtical, powerpille, t1, t2, t3, t4

    public abstract class block
extends java.lang.Object
    Standart Block in the the Game-Grid block world. It is parented to all the blocks you see on the Game-Grid itself.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Manuel Plonski

    • Field Summary

      Name of the Block
      java.lang.String path
      The Path to the image file of the block in the res package

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Location lc,
                          ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGBackground bd)
        Draws the Image of the block on the Game-Grid. This abstract method is describes a block should be drawn on the grid itself. The GGBackground object "bd" can be used to draw the desired shape or image to the Location "lc". This has to be set in order to draw an Level on the grid.
        Parameters:
        lc - Location to draw in the Grid
        bd - GGBackground Object to draw
